column4: Unique name of a chemical compound.(According to IUPAC) (eg: Azane)
Role it plays in the process (eg: Reagent)
Measure of Amount of Concentration (with units) (eg 17)
Commercial Name of the Chemical (eg: Anhydrous Ammonia)
Value of Temperature of the Chemical ( in °C) (eg: 31)
Description regarding the  chemical (or its process)
Software used in the chemical process. (eg: MATLAB)
